page.title: 18The Youth Club, Alston Moor
page.content: The group meets in The Topp twice a week on Mondays and Wednesdays from 7.30 p.m. to 9.30 p.m. during school term time. The club is run by a {leader and two assistants}who are employed by Cumbria County Council. There should be a member's committee and a management committee but nobody wants to belong so organisation is left to the leaders. There are{80 {members}but theyt do not attend all meetings. The activities are five-a-side football, table tennis, disco-dancing, table games, board games, cards and ccomputer and C.B. Radio. Sometimes they go swimming, roller skating, on trips to places or visits to other youth clubs. Most of the members go to Samuel King's School, but they can be members until they are 21 years old.
